augmented_topic: Technology in Daily Life (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Science Fiction lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about technology in daily life using informal register
Students create original scifi themed content about technology in daily life in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using informal register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in informal register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with technology
technology in daily life with innovation
technology in daily life with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
